717038410. Caux converted to reformed

Province of Nissa — Not random

Triggered by

Action A of 717038413 - AI_EVENT for Muslim Nations
Action A of 717038412 - AI_EVENT for Muslim Nations
Action A of 717038411 - AI_EVENT for Muslim Nations

Description

As a result of the spread of the reformation, the province is now considered as being of the reformed faith.

Actions

A. OK

  • Religion in Nissa changes to reformed
